title: Desaturate
desc:
Post 1803
- When you play this, all cards in players' hands with (whichever <:rgby:1107167371048788028> color was chosen for this card) will lose that color, including your other cards, except for this card.
- If that was their only color, they become <:gray:1107516393450127411>
- For each affected card, its owner gains **Gloom** 1.
- If no cards were affected by this, you draw a <:gray:1107516393450127411> card instead.
